import React, { useState, useCallback } from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import { Form, Input } from 'antd' function LoginForm() { const [id, setId] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') // @@ use useCallback to optimize when passing props in a component const onChangeId = useCallback((e) => { setId(e.target.value) }, []) const onChangePassword = useCallback((e) => { setPassword(e.target.value) }, []) return ( <>


) } export default LoginForm
